Subject: The Social Hub on Google Maps
What makes people happy: Service Quality (n=149), Amenities & Facilities (n=137), Room Quality & Design (n=136), Food & Beverage (n=122), Location & Accessibility (n=111), Community & Social Atmosphere (n=81), Cleanliness (n=44), Pricing & Value (n=19)
What frustrates people: Service Quality (n=36), Room Quality & Design (n=30), Community & Social Atmosphere (n=24), Amenities & Facilities (n=21), Food & Beverage (n=16), Cleanliness (n=13), Pricing & Value (n=12), Location & Accessibility (n=11)

Key quotes:
Positive: "Ótima localização, quarto confortável, bom atendimento, mas o maior diferencial é a área de coworking bonita e ampla, pra quem precisa trabalhar durante a viagem! Tem parceria de desconto com um estac"
Positive: "Hotel moderno, bien situado con servicios muy variados (cafetería, restaurante, lavandería, centro de planchado, gimnasio,...).
Habitación grande, insonorizada (o no estarían ocupadas las habitaciones"
Negative: "Social hub has been such a disappointment with its opening in Porto. It had so much potential and so many expats living here were hopeful but honestly it's been a disgrace. Pretentious under qualified"
Sample size: n=1000 Google Maps reviews across all locations
Data quality notes: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ High confidence, verified Google Maps reviews from 2024-2025. Large sample size provides statistical significance.
